2103.subject: TAT
2103.descrlong: Introduction to Animation Lab:  This lab is offered in conjunction with the ITCD/TAT209 lecture section.  Students will use studio and digital tools to complete projects that relate directly to the lecture content.  Students are expected to be comfortable with studio drawing tools as well as digital image software and have an ability to functionally adapt to new software.  Students must take the lab during the same semester as the lecture.
